H3.text: where did they film the royal tv series. Whitby

A4.text: Much of the outdoor scenes were primarily shot within North Yorkshire, including within Whitby and Scarborough

A5.text: Most of the exterior scenes were shot during the summer months at the Red Court building on Holbeck Road, South Cliff, Scarborough, as well as the nearby park area and Holbeck Clock Tower
